transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello ji Sahil sir
Customer: Ji awaz aa rahi hai aapko sir
Executive: Haan mam aa rahi hai boliye
Customer: Okay sir aap call kar rahe the na aap IndiaMART 9696 number pe customer care mein Sneha main Sneha bol rahi hu IndiaMART se aapke Sahil India Sonics ke account manager
Customer: Aapko main kitne time se dhoond raha hu account mein number hi nahi aa raha tha IndiaMART se
Executive: Achcha number nahi aa raha tha waha pe
Customer: Haan
Executive: Achcha koi baat nahi aapko main bata deti hu dekhiye main maine aapko message bhi kiya tha whatsapp pe fir se kar rahi hu aapko ek bar
Customer: Whatsapp pe kiya tha ye
Executive: Haan whatsapp pe fir se kar rahi hu Shoaib sir ka secondary number diya hai na aapne
Customer: Haan
Executive: Shoaib sir se meri baat hui thi aapko bhi main message kar rahi hu ek bar dekhiye sir aaya whatsapp pe
Customer: Dekhiye maine aapko message kiya
Executive: Dekhiye sir whatsapp pe abhi just bheja hai
Customer: Ek minute whatsapp pe bheja kya hai
Executive: Haan mam aa gaye
Customer: Haan ye number save kar lijiye aap ye mera number hai ispe aap call kariye plus whatsapp pe aap message kar sakte hain mujhe jo bhi jaise aapko kuch bhi changes karane hain kuch samajh mein nahi aa raha hai to uske regarding aap call karoge aap number save kar lo aur abhi kuch problem face kar rahe the aap aapne bahut bar
Customer: Kya rahi thi mam haan
Executive: Bataiye
Customer: To matlab leads vagaira jo matlab marble service ki aa rahi hai matlab jyadatar matlab makrana ki local lead aa rahi hai marble matlab aa nahi rahi
Executive: Achcha ek minute jo leads aapko aa rahi hain flooring ki aa rahi hain
Customer: Haan
Executive: Okay flooring service mein aap deal nahi karte
Customer: Nahi nahi mam flooring service mein nahi karte marble flooring ka karte hain matlab slab ka
Executive: Achcha ek minute jaise isme aapne dala hai flooring service hi aa rahi hai
Customer: Marble flooring service ye matlab ek aapka product ek service add hai IndiaMART ke catalog mein marble flooring service
Executive: Aapko main video meet ka link share kar rahi hu aap wo join karo fir aapko main batati hu
Customer: Theek hai main 10 minute mein karu khana kha ke
Executive: 10 minute mein achcha dedh baj raha hai okay aap abhi busy hain
Customer: Haan mam aapko main dhai baje call karu dhai baje
Executive: Haan dhai dhai baje kar lo koi dikkat nahi
Executive: Theek hai theek hai
Customer: Theek hai
Executive: Theek hai sir
Customer: Theek hai
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving calls from IndiaMART.

- Receiving leads for flooring instead of marble.



Resolution:

- Executive shared her contact number on WhatsApp.

- Executive offered a video meet to resolve issue.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back at 2:30 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, flooring, marble, whatsapp
